answers.answer: Congrats on 38 weeks!!! My induction (also GD) is scheduled for Feb 18th!! (Due date March 3rd) Too funny! Keep us updated on how your doing. Can't wait to hear your birth story!!!

question: I had my 38 week OB appointment today.  She started by saying that I was booked for an induction on Sunday as the recommendation for gestational diabetes is to induce at 38 weeks.  I questioned it and negotiated for Friday the 12th.  I guess there are a bunch of things that can go wrong, but my sugar levels have been good and the last sizing u/s was normal.  I'm totally freaked!  I know it's supposed to happen anytime, but it's so real now!  Wow!  So I'm hoping now that I last the week to finish up some relaxing sewing projects and such before my life changes to something new and exciting!  My original due date was Feb 18, so it's not really off at all.
title: Update on 38 wk OB appointment
